messages.subject: serendipity and sychronicity and other  weirdnesses
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/12/03 6:38:49 AM, Earthmomma67@aol.com writes:  This list is eerie lately, because people keep asking here what Holly lately ...
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/12/03 6:38:49 AM, Earthmomma67@... writes:

<< > This list is eerie lately, because people keep asking here what Holly
lately
>
> asked or discussed with me

Because she's really funny! >>

Well she is. And poor thing is sick and she's even funny when she describes
being sick or asks for help. She's a mine of good stories.

But the eerie creepy part is that here we are talking about whatever thing
comes up naturally, and repeatedly this week, someone will write something
that Holly and I just discussed, so I'm starting to feel uncomfortable saying
"just yesterday Holly asked me the same thing," but I'm up to four of them (a
couple were two days or three back, not just yesterday) and I'm starting to
feel like people will say "OH SURE, right, you and Holly did NOT 'just talk
about that yesterday.'"

Sandra
